attributes.action: Allow all Ukrainian refugees safe entry into the UK without Visa requirements
attributes.additional_details: Vladimir Putin's actions against the Ukrainian people are unacceptable. The international community should be doing all it can to stop him and to ensure the innocent civilians of a peaceful European nation are kept safe from harm. Opening our doors to these refugees immediately and without restriction would help accomplish this and send a message to Putin - the UK stands with Ukraine, not him.
attributes.background: The UK government must immediately waive all Visa requirements for Ukrainian refugees fleeing Vladimir Putin's war and do what it can to welcome them safely into our country.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
